text: [Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
hello I'm Faisal a cloud support
engineer here at the AWS office in
Virginia today I'm going to show you how
to manually install the AWS command line
interface on an Amazon elastic compute
Cloud Windows instance so let's get
started
other first step you must be sure that
you meet the install and update
requirements the instance must have
internet access using network address
translation Nat instance or an internet
gateway you have admin rights to install
software note we support the AWS CLI on
Microsoft supported versions of 64-bit
Windows to update your current
installation of AWS CLI on Windows
download a new installer each time you
update so that you overwrite previous
versions aw CLI is updated regularly to
see when the latest version was released
see the AWS CLI version 2 change log on
GitHub important if you already
installed AWS CLI version 1 then it's
best practice to uninstall version 1 and
use only AWS CLI version 2. download and
run the AWS CLI MSI installer for
Windows 64-bit
or you can run the MSI exit command to
run the MSI installer
when the installation prompt window
appears read and accept the license
agreement
choose a location to install the app
choose next and then choose install
to confirm the installation open the
start menu search for CMD to open
command prompt windows and at the
command prompt use the AWS space dash
dash version command to check the
version
and now you know how to manually install
the AWS CLI on an Amazon ec2 instance
thanks for watching and happy cloud
computing from all of us here at AWS
[Applause]
[Music]
